Translations.Text: Aur unke paas sharmili humsin biwiyan hongi
Yeh woh chezein hain jinhein hisaab ke din ata karne ka tumse wada kiya ja raha hai
Yeh hamara rizq hai jo kabhi khatam honaywala nahin
Yeh to hai muttaqiyon ka anjaam aur sarkashon ke liye badhtareen (evil) thikana hai
Jahannum jismein woh jhulse jayenge. Bahut hi buri qayamgaah
Yeh hai unke liye, pas woh maza chakhein khautley (boiling) huey pani aur peep lahu (pus)
Aur isi qisam ki dusri talkhiyon ka

(woh jahannum ki taraf apne pairawon ko aatey dekh kar aapas mein kahenge) “Yeh ek lashkar tumhare paas ghusa chala aa raha hai, koi khushamadeed (welcome) inke liye nahin hai, yeh aag mein jhulasne waley hain”
Woh unko jawab denge “ nahin balke tum hi jhulse ja rahe ho, koi khair maqdam tumhare liye nahin. Tumhi to yeh anjaam hamare aagey laye ho. Kaisi buri hai yeh jaaye qaraar”
Phir woh kahenge “Aey hamare Rubb, jisne humein is anjaam ko pahunchane ka bandobast kiya usko dozakh ka dohra azaab de”
Aur woh aapas mein kahenge “kya baat hai, hum un logon ko kahin nahin dekhte jinehin hum duniya mein bura samajte thay
Hunme yunhi unka mazaaq bana liya tha, ya woh kahin nazaron se ojhal hain?”
Beshak yeh baat sacchi hai, ehle dozakh mein yahi kuch jhagde honay waley hain
(Aey Nabi) insey kaho, “ main to bas khabardar kardene wala hoon. Koi haqeeqi mabood nahin magar Allah, jo yakta hai, sab par gaalib
Aasmaano aur zameen ka maalik aur un saari cheezon ka maalik jo inke darmiyan hain, zabardast aur darguzar karne wala”
Insey kaho “ yeh ek badi khabar hai
Jisko sunkar tum mooh pherte ho”
(Insey kaho) “Mujhey us waqt ki koi khabar na thi jab mala-e-aala (high council) mein jhagda ho raha tha
Mujhko to wahee (revelation/inspiration) ke zariye se yeh baatein sirf isliye batayi jaati hain ke main khula khula khabardar karne wala hoon”
Jab tere Rubb ne farishton se kaha “main mitti se ek bashar banane wala hoon
Phir jab main usey puri tarah bana doon aur usmein apni rooh phoonk doon to tum uske aagey sajde mein gir jao”
Is hukum ke mutaabiq farishtey sab ke sab sajde mein gir gaye
Magar Iblis ne apni badayi ka ghamand kiya aur woh kaafiron mein se ho gaya
Rubb ne farmaya “Aey Iblis, tujhey kya cheez usko sajda karne se maanay hui jisey maine apne dono haathon se banaya hai? Tu bada ban raha hai ya tu hai hi kuch unchey darje ki hastiyon mein se?”
Usne jawab diya “main ussey behtar hoon , aapne mujhko aag se paida kiya hai aur isko mitti se”
Farmaya “ accha to yahan se nikal ja , tu mardood hai
Aur tere upar yaum ul jaza tak meri laanat hai”
Woh bola “ aey mere Rubb , yeh baat hai to phir mujhey us waqt tak ke liye mohlat dey dey jab yeh log dobara uthaye jayenge”
Farmaya, “accha tujhey us roz tak ki mohlat hai
Jiska waqt mujhey maloom hai”
Usne kaha “ teri izzat ki kasam, main in sab logon ko behka kar rahunga
Bajuz tere un bandon ke jinhein tu nay khaalis karliya hai”
Farmaya “to haqq yeh hai, aur main haqq hi kaha karta hoon
Ke main jahannum ko tujhse aur un sab logon se bhar dunga jo in Insano mein se teri pairwi karenge”
(Aey Nabi) insey kehdo ke main is tableeg par tumse koi ajar nahin maangta, aur na main banawati logon mein se hoon
Yeh to ek naseehat hai tamam jahaan walon ke liye
Aur thodi muddat hi guzaregi ke tumhein iska haal khud maaloom ho jayega
Is kitaab ka nuzul Allah zabardast aur dana (hikmat wala/full of Wisdom) ki taraf se hai
(Aey Muhammad) yeh kitab humne tumhari taraf barhaqq nazil ki hai, lihaza tum Allah hi ki bandagi karo deen ko usi ke liye khalis karte huey

Khabardar, deen e khalis Allah ka haqq hai.Rahey woh log jinhon ne uske siwa dusre sarparst bana rakkhe hain (aur apne is fail ki taujeeh yeh karte hain ke) hum to unki ibadat sirf is liye karte hain ke woh Allah tak hamari rasayi karadein (bring us nearer to Allah).Allah yaqeenan unke darmiyan un tamaam baaton ka faisla kardega jin mein woh ikhtilaf kar rahey hain. Allah kisi aisey shaks ko hidayat nahin deta jo jhoota aur munkir e haqq ho
Agar Allah kisi ko beta banana chahta to apni makhlooq mein se jisko chahta barguzida kar leta, Paak hai woh issey (ke koi uska beta ho), woh Allah hai akela aur sab par gaalib

Usne aasmano aur zameen ko barhaqq paida kiya hai. Wahi din par raat aur raat par din ko lapeit-ta hai.Usi ne Suraj aur Chand ko is tarah musakkhar kar rakkha hai ke har ek ek waqt e muqarrar tak chale ja raha hai. Jaan rakkho, woh zabardast hai aur darguzar karne wala hai

Usi ne tumko ek jaan se paida kiya, phir wahi hai jisne us jaan se iska joda banaya aur usi ne tumhare liye maweshiyon mein se aath (eight) nar o maada paida kiye. Woh tumhari Maaon (mothers) ke paithon mein teen teen tareekh (andherey) paradon ke andar tumhein ek ke baad ek shakal deta chala jaata hai. Yahi Allah (jiske yeh kaam hain) tumhara Rubb hai, baadshahi usi ki hai, koi mabood uske siwa nahin hai, phir tum kidhar se phiraye jaa rahe ho

Agar tum kufr karo to Allah tumse be niyaz hai, lekin woh apne bandon ke liye kufr ko pasand nahin karta. Aur agar tum shukar karo to usey woh tumhare liye pasand karta hai. Koi bojh uthane wala kisi dusre ka bojh na uthayega.Aakhir e kaar tum sab ko apne Rubb ki taraf palatna hai, phir woh tumhein bata dega ke tum kya karte rahe ho, woh to dilon ka haal tak jaanta hai
